about_the_game:
By the power of the ancient Monoliths, you are tasked with the responsibility to both defend and expand the dominion of your chosen allegiance

You'll battle your opponents with magical spells, auras, and weaponry that you acquire through combat as loot or through crafting with the soul shards obtained from your fallen opponents. The ability to manipulate souls runs deep within you, and as a special power you can recall the dead minions of your enemies and herald them as you own, or you can process their magical souls to empower yourself and your weapons!
Through your exploration of the realm, you will find hidden treasures, resources, and new ways to bolster your army and powers that you can use in your effort to annihilate your opponent’s Monolith and reclaim their territories for you own. But beware, if your focus should stray too much, the enemy might seize the opportunity to destroy your own Monolith, and parts of your dominion will fall to their forces.

How will you expand your kingdom, what path will you take, and how will you decimate your foes?
The choice is yours!

In this strategical wave-based action RPG, you manage waves of mobs that you are provided with. You can enhance and change the layout of your waves as well as empower you own hero that you can use to prevent the opponent from getting into your base and destroying your Monolith.
The game provides the player with different ways to prevent the enemies’ waves of becoming too powerful. You can manage what minions you with to spawn in your wave and how they will attack, enhance your city’s defenses, craft powerful weapons, spells, and auras to enhance your guardian. And lastly you can capture the lost souls of your enemies, so that they can become part of your next wave!

short_description: As defender of the realm you'll harvest the souls of your opponents and use their powers to your advantage. Use the ancient Monoliths to spawn waves of minions powered by the souls of your enemies. Explore the world, evolve your powers and ultimately forge your dominion in this strategic ARPG.
